mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna(qna_num, qna_writer, qna_title, qna_content, regdate, dvd_num) VALUES(qna_seq.NEXTVAL, #{qna_writer}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, SYSDATE, #{dvd_num})
mapper.select: SELECT qna_num, qna_writer, qna_title, qna_content, dvd_num, qna_answer, regdate FROM qna WHERE dvd_num = #{dvd_num} ORDER BY qna_num
